column5: This beautifully preserved early 1900's bungalow is minutes from downtown Houston, the Heights, & White Oak Music Hall. It's also just minutes from Eleanor Tinsley Park, Buffalo Bayou Park, St Arnold's Brewery, Montrose, restaurants, & more. For those traveling without a car, just a few blocks away is the light rial into downtown, the museum district, & the medical center. This room is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, & business travelers.
column8: Charming Bungalow Bedroom w/Private Bath on Rail
